授業目的: The goal of this course is to master the theoretical and computational skills to implement theoretical research in the field of modern condensed matter physics.
到達目標: Students master the theoretical and computational skills to study and tackle some problems in the field of modern condensed matter physics.
関連科目: quantum theory, solid state theory, statistical mechanics, qunatum field theory, computational physics

トピック.授業外学習2: Students should work hard to master the academic skills to implement this course.
